title: The Adventures of Frank Russell, The Consultant Hero

story.text: Frank Russell discovers an ancient artifact while consulting at an excavation site. The artifact grants him the power of telepathy, which he plans to use for aiding in conflict resolution and facilitation of productive communications.
Frank uses his new powers to prevent a major corporate conflict. He reads both parties' minds to uncover misunderstandings and brings them to an agreement, saving hundreds of jobs.

During a seminar, Frank senses an attendee hiding crucial information about a failing safety measure. He discreetly uses his powers to extract the truth and instruct the team on necessary precautions, averting potential danger.
Frank is invited to consult for a high-profile diplomatic meeting. His telepathy helps bridge language barriers, and his interventions lead to a historic peace agreement.
Aware of his growing influence, Frank holds a workshop for young consultants and instructors, imparting ethical guidelines on using special abilities in their careers.

While at a local charity event, Frank uncovers a plot to embezzle funds through his telepathic abilities. He discreetly gathers evidence against the culprits and informs the authorities, safeguarding the charity's future.

Taking a well-deserved break, Frank reflects on his week and decides to write a guide on using extraordinary abilities for the greater good, ensuring his experiences can inspire and educate future generations.

ending: Frank Russell's week of heroic deeds demonstrates the power of using one's abilities for the betterment of society.
moral: Great power comes with great responsibility; use your unique abilities to contribute positively to the world.
